short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to optimize images before downloading them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension to optimize images before downloading them.
It uses Cloudinary API to compress images. 
It also allows you to download images in different formats and resolutions.
